subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Carlos Beltrán cranked a colossal two-run home run that helped Tom Glavine add a victory to another stellar performance as the Mets defeated the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 1 of the N.L.C.S.
snippet: Carlos Beltrán cranked a colossal two-run home run that helped Tom Glavine add a victory to another stellar performance as the Mets defeated the St. Louis Cardinals in Game 1 of the N.L.C.S.
